'''Una''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A merchant plying her trade selling gemstones and jewelry to the denizens and visitors to [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/).

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Accessories, clothing and gemstones, including the unique: [Pearlescent Helstone Helm](/pearlescentHelstoneHelm/) and [Ring of Boundless Stars](/ringOfBoundlessStars/)
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Note

=
* She is available during the day. However, she will disappear if [The Final Maneuver](/theFinalManeuver/) is active.<ref name="topic102369"/>

{{References|30em|refs=
<ref name="topic102369">[https://forums.obsidian.net/topic/102369-unas-luxuries-merchant-missing Una's Luxuries merchant missing]</ref> 
}}
[Category:Serpent's Crown characters](/categorySerpentsCrownCharacters/)

==Background==
A merchant plying her trade selling gemstones and jewelry to the denizens and visitors to [[Serpent's Crown]].
